> [!NOTE]\
>关于“时雨ink”这个名字\
「时雨（しぐれ） → 墨水与灵感的骤雨」  
*时雨（しぐれ）是日本俳句中转瞬即逝的灵感之雨\
About the Name "Shigure Ink"\
"Shigure (しぐれ) → A sudden rain of ink and inspiration"\
*Shigure (しぐれ) refers to the fleeting rain of inspiration in Japanese haiku.
